text.data-name: She missed her friends She missed her family She missed her classroom She missed her books She missed all the fun she used to ha

svg.text: She missed her friends She missed her family She missed her classroom She missed her books She missed all the fun she used to have

text.data-name: Hi Inara, I have missed you so so very much and I cant wait to have you back at school. Hugs and kisses Miss Fridd
text.tspan: I have missed you so so very much and I cant wait to have you back at school.

text.data-name: She had been waiting eagerly for the virus to go away so life could go back to the way it used to be. One of her wishes was so

svg.text: She had been waiting eagerly for the virus to go away so life could goback to the way it used to be. One of her wishes was soon coming true. Because she was soon goingto go back to school.
